members.name: isReadOnly
members.comment: Returns the value of the read-only attribute. This attribute is often used as a simple access control mechanism to prevent files from being deleted or updated. Whether the file system or platform does any enforcement to prevent read-only files from being updated is implementation specific.

return: the value of the read-only attribute

members.name: isHidden
members.comment: Returns the value of the hidden attribute. This attribute is often used to indicate if the file is visible to users.

return: the value of the hidden attribute

members.name: isArchive
members.comment: Returns the value of the archive attribute. This attribute is typically used by backup programs.

return: the value of the archive attribute

members.name: isSystem
members.comment: Returns the value of the system attribute. This attribute is often used to indicate that the file is a component of the operating system.

return: the value of the system attribute
